div.p: In the engineering thing the work we do is seasonal so in the winter it would be from 8 o’clock until 5 o’clock with what’s meant to be
an hour for dinner but it never happens; in the summertime it could be any time from 6 in the morning until 10 or 11 at night
depending on the season and how the farmers are using their machinery. On the other side of the coin, on the sports side,
it can be school holidays, out of hours, evenings 6 o’clock until 10 o’clock, also in school time going in and helping...
The hours are less but they’re probably more flexible I suppose would be a good way to put it
